name: Deep Sea (Over One Studio)
description:
Deep Sea is an emotionally driven adventure woven through the dream-like memories of Amara and her grandfather.

  • Explore five visually stunning islands, each with their own unique story
  • Discover artifacts lost to time and uncover their hidden past
  • Listen to an emotionally captivating soundtrack composed by industry veterans
  • Relive past memories and apply their lessons throughout your journey of self-discovery
